text:
iTE University of Iowa
radio Broadcasting Stations
WSUI AND KSUI (FM)
Iowa City
December 5> 1955
Dr, Harry Skornia
Executive Director
NAEB
14 Gregory Hall
University of Illinois
Urbana, Illinois
Dear Dr. Skornia:
Here is my expense account for the Program Planning Committee
trip last weekend,
I was pleasantly surprised at the effectiveness and import¬
ance of the meeting. Since I had not applied myself to this
committee before (and there was a lot we didn’t know until then)
I had assumed that everything was somewhat dormant. Because
Ken Wright sounded apprehensive, too, the night before, I would
assume that your information and invigorating presence were
the crucial ingredients.
The meeting started the wheels rolling in my mind for
something here which I might approach you about later.
Thanks for everything.
Lee Eitzen
